name: Brian's Banner
description:
Brian is the king of the Forest Kingdom. One day, a villager comes to him informing him that monsters have infested the Mighty Shroom, the ever-evolving dungeon in the lands, and they have begun to kidnap villagers. It is the Brian’s responsibility to restore peace and rescue the villagers.

Play alone or with a friend while you follow the journey of King Brian and Prince Barry as he ventures into the Mighty Shroom to save his kidnapped villagers.
